c1.name: "O Lips, Weave Me Songs and Psalms"
c1.descriptionRaw:
After Lauma uses her Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11192}Runo: Dawnless Rest of Karsikko{/LINK}</color> or her Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11195}Runo: All Hearts Become the Beating Moon{/LINK}</color>, she will gain Threads of Life for 20s.
During this time, when nearby party members trigger Lunar-Bloom reactions, nearby active characters will recover HP equal to 500% of Lauma's Elemental Mastery. This effect can be triggered once every 1.9s.
Additionally, the Stamina cost for Lauma's Spirit Envoy Form will be reduced by 40%, and its Max Duration will be extended by 5s.
c1.description:
After Lauma uses her Elemental Skill **Runo: Dawnless Rest of Karsikko** or her Elemental Burst **Runo: All Hearts Become the Beating Moon**, she will gain Threads of Life for 20s.
During this time, when nearby party members trigger Lunar-Bloom reactions, nearby active characters will recover HP equal to 500% of Lauma's Elemental Mastery. This effect can be triggered once every 1.9s.
Additionally, the Stamina cost for Lauma's Spirit Envoy Form will be reduced by 40%, and its Max Duration will be extended by 5s.

c2.name: "Twine Warnings and Tales From the North"
c2.descriptionRaw:
The Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11195}Runo: All Hearts Become the Beating Moon{/LINK}</color> is enhanced:
· {LINK#N11190003}<color=#FFD780FF>Pale Hymn</color>{/LINK} effects are increased: All nearby party members' Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon DMG is further increased by 500% of Lauma's Elemental Mastery, and their Lunar-Bloom DMG is further increased by 400% of Lauma's Elemental Mastery.

<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: All nearby party members' Lunar-Bloom DMG is increased by 40%.
c2.description:
The Elemental Burst **Runo: All Hearts Become the Beating Moon** is enhanced:
· **Pale Hymn** effects are increased: All nearby party members' Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon DMG is further increased by 500% of Lauma's Elemental Mastery, and their Lunar-Bloom DMG is further increased by 400% of Lauma's Elemental Mastery.

Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: All nearby party members' Lunar-Bloom DMG is increased by 40%.

c3.name: "Seek Not to Tread the Sly Fox's Path"
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11195}Runo: All Hearts Become the Beating Moon{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of **Runo: All Hearts Become the Beating Moon** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: "Nor Yearn for the Great Bear's Might"
c4.descriptionRaw: When attacks from the {LINK#N11190001}<color=#FFD780FF>Frostgrove Sanctuary</color>{/LINK} summoned by her Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11192}Runo: Dawnless Rest of Karsikko{/LINK}</color> hit opponents, Lauma will regain 4 Elemental Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.
c4.description: When attacks from the **Frostgrove Sanctuary** summoned by her Elemental Skill **Runo: Dawnless Rest of Karsikko** hit opponents, Lauma will regain 4 Elemental Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

c5.name: "If Truth May Be Subject to Witness"
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11192}Runo: Dawnless Rest of Karsikko{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of **Runo: Dawnless Rest of Karsikko** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: "I Offer Blood and Tears to the Moonlight"
c6.descriptionRaw:
When the {LINK#N11190001}<color=#FFD780FF>Frostgrove Sanctuary</color>{/LINK} attacks opponents, it will deal 1 additional instance of <color=#99FF88FF>AoE Dendro DMG</color> equal to 185% of Lauma's Elemental Mastery. This DMG is considered Lunar-Bloom DMG. This instance of DMG will not consume any {LINK#N11190003}<color=#FFD780FF>Pale Hymn</color>{/LINK} stacks and will provide Lauma with 2 stacks of Pale Hymn, as well as refreshing the duration of Pale Hymn stacks gained in this manner.
This effect can occur up to 8 times during each Frostgrove Sanctuary. When using the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11192}Runo: Dawnless Rest of Karsikko{/LINK}</color>, all Pale Hymn stacks gained in this manner will be removed.

Additionally, when Lauma uses a Normal Attack while she has Pale Hymn stacks, she will consume 1 stack to convert this to deal <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color> equal to 150% of her Elemental Mastery. This DMG is considered Lunar-Bloom DMG.

<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: All nearby party members' Lunar-Bloom DMG is {LINK#N11190007}<color=#FFD780FF>elevated</color>{/LINK} by 25%.
c6.description:
When the **Frostgrove Sanctuary** attacks opponents, it will deal 1 additional instance of AoE Dendro DMG equal to 185% of Lauma's Elemental Mastery. This DMG is considered Lunar-Bloom DMG. This instance of DMG will not consume any **Pale Hymn** stacks and will provide Lauma with 2 stacks of Pale Hymn, as well as refreshing the duration of Pale Hymn stacks gained in this manner.
This effect can occur up to 8 times during each Frostgrove Sanctuary. When using the Elemental Skill **Runo: Dawnless Rest of Karsikko**, all Pale Hymn stacks gained in this manner will be removed.

Additionally, when Lauma uses a Normal Attack while she has Pale Hymn stacks, she will consume 1 stack to convert this to deal Dendro DMG equal to 150% of her Elemental Mastery. This DMG is considered Lunar-Bloom DMG.

Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: All nearby party members' Lunar-Bloom DMG is **elevated** by 25%.
